resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3086</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">My Favorite chocolate Cake Recipe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mein Lieblingsschokolade Kuchen-Rezept</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ma recette préférée de gâteau de chocolat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Minha receita favorita do bolo de chocolate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La mia ricetta favorita della torta di 
cioccolato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αγαπημένη συνταγή κέικ σοκολάτας μου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mi receta preferida de la torta de chocolate</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a lesson plan for activities and a student worksheet on the subject of food, students learn appropriate vocabulary and write their own recipe for chocolate cake</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Lektionplan für Aktivitäten und 
einen Kursteilnehmerbogen bezüglich der Nahrung, erlernen 
Kursteilnehmer passenden Wortschatz und schreiben ihr eigenes Rezept 
für Schokolade Kuchen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un plan de leçon pour des activités et un
tableau d'étudiant au sujet de nourriture, les étudiants apprennent 
le vocabulaire approprié et écrivent leur propre recette pour le 
gâteau de chocolat</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma planta da lição para atividades e 
uma folha do estudante no assunto do alimento, os estudantes aprendem 
o vocabulário apropriado e escrevem sua própria receita para o bolo 
de chocolate</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un programma di lezione per le attività 
e un foglio di lavoro dell'allievo a proposito di alimento, gli 
allievi imparano il vocabolario adatto e scrivono la loro propria 
ricetta per la torta di cioccolato</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για τις 
δραστηριότητες και ένα φύλλο εργασίας σπουδαστών σχετικά με το 
θέμα των τροφίμων, οι σπουδαστές μαθαίνουν το κατάλληλο 
λεξιλόγιο και γράφουν τη συνταγή τους για το κέικ σοκολάτας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un plan de la lección para las 
actividades y una hoja de trabajo del estudiante a propósito de 
alimento, los estudiantes aprenden vocabulario apropiado y escriben su
propia receta para la torta de chocolate</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
